title: KICKED OUT
body: hey i got kicked out of a game level 5 as zac. So i relogged and tried to join the game but it never gave me the option it only said i could requeue. what happened and am i gonna get punished or banned?

replies.body: I looked up this match and it looks like it ended early and disappeared.  The server may have dropped the game, which is a bummer, but it shouldn't impact your game stats.  While rare, it can happen sometimes.  I wouldn't expect any penalties coming as a result.  Let me know if that clears things up!
thanks so much that helps a lot
